title: Mysterious HMD phone pops up in new leak
description: We haven’t seen HMD smartphone leaks for a while, but leakster @smashx_60 is bringing us our first look at an unannounced device from the brand. The post shows the back of the yet-to-be-announced HMD smartphone in three colors – purple, green and gray. While we don’t get a name or any specs for the phone in question, it somewhat resembles the HMD Pulse Pro. The camera island has a text that shows it will feature a 50MP main camera. There’s a second module below it and an LED flash on the side. Other than that, we don’t have much to work with. This upcoming device will most likely be...
excerpt: It will most likely be part of the maker's growing budget lineup of devices. We haven’t seen HMD smartphone leaks for a while, but leakster @smashx_60 is...
text: We haven’t seen HMD smartphone leaks for a while, but leakster @smashx_60 is bringing us our first look at an unannounced device from the brand. The post shows the back of the yet-to-be-announced HMD smartphone in three colors – purple, green and gray. While we don’t get a name or any specs for the phone in question, it somewhat resembles the HMD Pulse Pro. The camera island has a text that shows it will feature a 50MP main camera. There’s a second module below it and an LED flash on the side. Other than that, we don’t have much to work with. This upcoming device will most likely be part of HMD’s growing budget lineup of devices. We should be getting more leaks in the coming weeks, which will hopefully clarify things. Source
html:
We haven’t seen HMD smartphone leaks for a while, but leakster @smashx_60 is bringing us our first look at an unannounced device from the brand. The post shows the back of the yet-to-be-announced HMD smartphone in three colors – purple, green and gray.

While we don’t get a name or any specs for the phone in question, it somewhat resembles the HMD Pulse Pro. The camera island has a text that shows it will feature a 50MP main camera. There’s a second module below it and an LED flash on the side.

Other than that, we don’t have much to work with. This upcoming device will most likely be part of HMD’s growing budget lineup of devices. We should be getting more leaks in the coming weeks, which will hopefully clarify things.

Source
